card_text: "Elemental HERO Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss"$NMust first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling the above cards you control into the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) During the End Phase: Shuffle this card into the Extra Deck. Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; destroy that target, then apply the effect based on its type.$N●Monster: This card cannot attack this turn.$N●Spell: This card can attack your opponent directly this turn.$N●Trap: Change this card to Defense Position.
